welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Haverstraw, a charming city known for its picturesque views and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful destination has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, Westchester County Apt Airport offers a luxurious and convenient private jet terminal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Orange County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'LGA Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
